statement.name: final
statement.parts: SELECT STMT0060.SOSIKI ,STMT0060.TENCD ,STMT0060.GRPCD ,STMT0060.GRPNM ,STMT0060.GRPNMK ,STMT0060.MENTF ,STMT0060.DELYMD ,STMT0060.ADDYMD ,STMT0060.ADDHMS ,STMT0060.UPDYMD ,STMT0060.UPDHMS FROM STMT0060 WHERE STMT0060.SOSIKI = '0001' AND STMT0060.TENCD = '0000' AND STMT0060.GRPCD =
